tasks.title: Set up project configuration files
tasks.description: Create initial configuration files including requirements.txt, package.json, vite.config.js, tailwind.config.js, and environment variable templates for FastAPI and React setup.

tasks.title: Create FastAPI application structure
tasks.description: Set up main.py with FastAPI app instance, CORS middleware, static files mounting, and basic routing structure. Create app/api directory structure for organizing endpoints.

tasks.title: Migrate database utilities to async pattern
tasks.description: Convert sqlite3_utilities.py to use async/await pattern with aiosqlite. Update all database read/write operations to be async compatible.

tasks.title: Create Pydantic models for API requests/responses
tasks.description: Define Pydantic models for all API endpoints including Chassis, Card, Port, License, Sensor, Performance metrics, and configuration models.

tasks.title: Migrate chassis endpoints to FastAPI
tasks.description: Convert GET /chassisDetails route to GET /api/chassis endpoint with proper async handling, error handling, and JSON response format.

tasks.title: Migrate card endpoints to FastAPI
tasks.description: Convert GET /cardDetails route to GET /api/cards endpoint with async database operations and standardized JSON responses.

tasks.title: Migrate port, license, and sensor endpoints to FastAPI
tasks.description: Convert GET /portDetails, GET /licenseDetails, and GET /sensorInformation routes to FastAPI endpoints (/api/ports, /api/licenses, /api/sensors).

tasks.title: Migrate configuration and tag management endpoints
tasks.description: Convert POST /uploader, POST /setPollingIntervals, POST /addTags, POST /removeTags endpoints to FastAPI with proper request validation.

tasks.title: Migrate performance metrics and polling endpoints
tasks.description: Convert GET /lineChartPerfMetrics, POST /getLogs, and GET /pollLatestData/{category} endpoints to FastAPI with async support.

tasks.title: Set up React + Vite frontend project
tasks.description: Initialize React project with Vite, configure Tailwind CSS, set up shadcn/ui components library, create src directory structure, and configure path aliases.

tasks.title: Create API client and state management
tasks.description: Set up axios instance for API calls, create React context providers for global state, implement error handling middleware, and create custom hooks for API calls.

tasks.title: Build reusable UI components with shadcn/ui
tasks.description: Create and configure shadcn/ui components including Table, Dialog, Button, Input, Select, Tabs, Toast, and Card components. Set up component library structure.

tasks.title: Implement Chassis Details page
tasks.description: Create React component for chassis details with data table, filtering, sorting, tag management, and refresh functionality. Integrate with /api/chassis endpoint.

tasks.title: Implement Card, Port, License, and Sensor pages
tasks.description: Create React components for card details, port details, license details, and sensor information pages with tables and filtering capabilities.

tasks.title: Implement Performance Metrics page with charts
tasks.description: Create performance metrics page with Recharts integration, line charts for CPU and memory utilization, chassis selector, and real-time data updates.

tasks.title: Implement Configuration and Settings pages
tasks.description: Create upload configuration page and settings page for polling intervals. Implement form validation and error handling.

tasks.title: Set up routing and navigation
tasks.description: Configure React Router with all routes, create navigation component, implement layout wrapper, and handle route transitions.

tasks.title: Update Docker configuration
tasks.description: Update Dockerfile to build and serve frontend static files, create docker-compose.yml for development, and ensure all services work together.

tasks.title: Testing and bug fixes
tasks.description: Test all endpoints, verify frontend-backend integration, fix any bugs, ensure data persistence works correctly, and verify all existing functionality is preserved.

tasks.title: Update documentation and deployment guide
tasks.description: Update README.md with new setup instructions, document API endpoints, create deployment guide, and update any relevant documentation.

tasks.title: Create project structure documentation
tasks.description: Create comprehensive documentation explaining the FastAPI project structure, directory organization, and how to run the application locally.

tasks.title: Create Docker build and deployment documentation
tasks.description: Create detailed documentation for building Docker images for Linux, running containers, and deploying the application in production environments.

tasks.title: Add color coding for Card State in Chassis and Cards views
tasks.description: Implement color coding for Card State column: green for 'UP' state, red for 'DOWN' state in both Chassis and Cards views.

tasks.title: Add color coding for Link State in Ports view
tasks.description: Implement color coding for Link State column: green for 'UP', red for 'DOWN', and orange/yellow/pink for other states based on the Link State string value.

tasks.title: Add color coding for License Status
tasks.description: Implement color coding for License Status column: red for Status not equal to 'Active'.

tasks.title: Add Export to Excel (CSV) functionality to all table pages
tasks.description: Add 'Export to Excel' button on all table pages (Chassis, Cards, Ports, Licenses, Sensors) to export data as CSV files.

tasks.title: Combine Config and Settings tabs into a single page
tasks.description: Merge ConfigPage and SettingsPage into a single unified page with tabs for Chassis Configuration and Polling Settings.

tasks.title: Implement dark mode theme with professional SaaS dashboard colors
tasks.description: Apply dark mode theme across the application with professional SaaS dashboard color scheme (dark backgrounds, good contrast, modern blue accents).
